author: Staff Reporter
M K
text: Rotary Coimbatore Heritage conducted an organ donation awareness programme at Krishna Gounder Marriage Hall, Maniyakaranpalayam, on Sunday. Resource person Jerry Rosario elaborated on organ donation and threw light on skin donation and how it is of help to accident victims. A salient feature of the event was an exhibition on human anatomy and functions of various parts of the body that was organised by students of a nursing college and a school.
title: Awareness programme
